slidesEventObject.description: The Slides event object is the portion of the overall event object that carries information about a user's Google Slides document. It's only present in an event object if the host application is Google Slides.

id.description: The ID of the document open in the Slides UI

title.description: The title of the document open in the Slides UI

addonHasFileScopePermission.description: Whether or not the add-on has drive.file scope permission for this document.
